title: Brand: AcuRite / Part #: 00256M
body_html:
Item #: 67737478
Brand: AcuRite
Model #: 00256M

Product Specifications

Meter Type Anemometer/Hygrometer/Thermometer/Light Meter; Wind Speed Indicator
Measures Airflow; Humidity; Ambient Temperature
Maximum Air Velocity ft/min (Feet) 52 knots; 60 mph; 1990 ft/min; 97 km/h; 27 m/s
Humidity Sensing Yes
Data Logging No
Auto Power Off Yes
Minimum Air Velocity 0.1 knots; 0.1 km/h; 0.1 mph; 0.1 ft/min; 0.1 m/s
Minimum Process Temperature -40 ?F
Maximum Process Temperature 150 ?F
Features Tripod Mountable; For Tripods w/1/4" 20-Thread Fitting (Tripod Not Included); Accurately Provides 1-Second Updates of Wind Speeds From 0 to 60 mph, 0 to 97 km/H, 0 to 52 knots, 0 to 27 M/s, and 0 to 1990 ft/min; Wind Speed Meter Features a Precision Anemometer That Measures Current Wind Speed, Average and Peak Wind Speed, and Offers a Wind Speed Alarm; Altimeter (Measures Current Elevation and Total Change In Elevation); Measures Wind Speed, Temperature, Humidity, Altitude, Wind Chill, and Heat Index; Storage Pouch; Extendable Design Allows For Measuring Wind Velocity In Hard-To-Reach Places; Integrated LED Inspection Light And Backlit Display For Visibility In Dark Areas
